sense.name: possession, interest or ownership
sense.examples: Three investors own major stakes of that biotech start-up. Get those with a stake in the election's outcome to do fundraising. We all have a stake in our children's education.

sense.name: a vertical pole or post that serves some purpose.
sense.examples: Small wooden stakes connected with string formed a demarcation around the seedlings. She was burned at the stake for allegedly being a witch. He drove a stake through the vampire's heart. The left stake on John's flatbed truck got damaged in the accident.

sense.name: a wager or bet
sense.examples: This is a high stakes poker table. The stakes on this race horse have tripled in the last fifteen minutes. What sort of stakes are you asking us to put up anyway?
